context: Michael managed Stevan during his outsourced engagement with Catena Media on AskGamblers.com
name: Michael Rodriguez
text:
I had the pleasure of working with Stevan for over a year on our AskGamblers
platform, and his impact was transformative. When Stevan joined our team, we had
several performance bottlenecks that had been plaguing us for months despite
multiple attempts to resolve them. Within his first two weeks, Stevan not only
identified the root causes but implemented solutions that reduced our server
resource usage by 90% – a result that seemed impossible before he arrived.

What impressed me most was his systematic approach to problem-solving. Stevan
didn't just fix immediate issues; he refactored entire subsystems to prevent
similar problems in the future. His initiatives around clean architecture and
code quality elevated our entire team's standards. Multiple developers told me
that working with Stevan significantly improved their understanding of
architectural patterns and performance optimization.

Beyond his technical excellence, Stevan was an exceptional team player. He
mentored junior developers, conducted thorough code reviews, and always made
time to explain complex concepts. His communication skills made him valuable not
just to engineering but across the organization – product managers and
stakeholders consistently praised his ability to explain technical trade-offs in
business terms.

I would work with Stevan again without hesitation and recommend him highly for
senior engineering roles or technical leadership positions. He's the kind of
engineer who makes everyone around him better.
title: VP of Engineering
